'''''Vinyar Tengwar 6''''' is the sixth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|5|7}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "But Lungorthin, Lord of Balrogs, on the Mouth Smote Him" — Tom Loback
* E.L.F. News
* Letters to ''VT''

* "Glossaries from the '[[Etymologies]]', Part II" — Ronald Kyrmse
* "J.R.R. Tolkien’s Runes" — Jane Sibley
* "''Essitalmar'': Context, Context, Context..." (column) — Tom Loback
* "''Nirnaeth Galadriel''" — trans. Craig Marnock
* "''[[Narqelion]]''" — J.R.R. Tolkien
* "A Brief Note on the Background of the Letter from J.R.R. Tolkien to [[Dick Plotz]] Concerning the Declension of the High-elvish Noun"✫ — Jorge Quiñónez

<small>✫ contains formerly unpublished material</small>
